member.name: T:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA
member.summary: Provides methods for analyzing and comparing PLC devices information from a TIA Portal project.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.GetTiaProjectContains(OpennessV16.HMATIAOpenness_V16,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves information about PLC devices from the given TIA Portal interface and constructs a object.
member.param: The TIA Openness interface used to interact with the TIA Portal project.
A string for reporting or handling errors during the process.
member.returns: A instance containing information about the project and its PLC devices.
member.remarks: This method collects project metadata, language, version, and analyzes each device. It extracts main module properties, executes various analyses, and fills the project structure with detailed device data.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.FindMainModule(Siemens.Engineering.HW.Device)
member.summary: Finds and returns the main module (CPU) from a given device.
member.param: The device to search for the main module.
member.returns: The main if found; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.CreateAutomateFromModule(Siemens.Engineering.HW.DeviceItem)
member.summary: Creates and populates an object from the specified main module.
member.param: The main module from which to extract properties.
member.returns: An instance of filled with properties and configuration details from the main module.
member.remarks: This method extracts and organizes hardware, firmware, configuration, and sub-item information for the automate.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.FindGamme(Siemens.Engineering.HW.DeviceItem)
member.summary: Determines the product range (series) of the specified main module.
member.param: The main for which to find the range.
member.returns: A representing the range of the device (e.g., "S7-1200", "S7-1500"), or "Non trouvé" if not found.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.TestOnlineAccess(Siemens.Engineering.HW.DeviceItem)
member.summary: Tests the online accessibility of the given main module.
member.param: The to test online access for.
member.returns: "True" if the online connection can be established; otherwise, "False".

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.AnalyzeObBlocks(Siemens.Engineering.HW.DeviceItem,ReceptionDeProjet.MyAutomate)
member.summary: Analyzes OB and FC blocks from the specified main module, and populates the automate with the related information.
member.param: The object to be populated with block analysis results.
member.remarks: This method analyzes all Function (FC) and Organization Block (OB) objects, extracts their cross-references, and builds up the internal structure of the automate including nested and referenced blocks.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.CalculStatPLC(ReceptionDeProjet.MyAutomate)
member.summary: Calculates statistics for LTU and OB blocks in the specified automate.
member.param: The object containing OBs and block data.
member.remarks: The method calculates the percentage of LTU blocks, and the percentage of blocks in OB1 and OB35 relative to the total.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.AppendBlocInfo(System.Text.StringBuilder,ReceptionDeProjet.MyBloc,System.Int32)
member.summary: Recursively appends information about a block and its sub-blocks to the specified .
member.param: The current recursion depth for indentation.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.GetAllBlocksFromCPU(Siemens.Engineering.HW.DeviceItem)
member.summary: Retrieves all objects from the specified CPU device item, including those in subfolders.
member.returns: A list of all objects found in the device and its group hierarchy.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.GatherBlocksFromGroup(Siemens.Engineering.SW.Blocks.PlcBlockUserGroup,System.Collections.Generic.List{Siemens.Engineering.SW.Blocks.PlcBlock})
member.summary: Recursively gathers all objects from the specified group and its subgroups.
member.param: The list to which found blocks are added.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.CalculerPourcentageDeBlocsLTU(ReceptionDeProjet.MyOB)
member.summary: Calculates the percentage of LTU blocks in the specified block list.
member.param: The object for which to calculate the percentage.
member.returns: A representing the LTU block percentage. Returns 0.0 if no blocks are present.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.PIDOB1(ReceptionDeProjet.MyAutomate)
member.summary: Checks for the presence of PID blocks in OB1 and updates the automate accordingly.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.BlockProtection(Siemens.Engineering.HW.DeviceItem,ReceptionDeProjet.MyAutomate)
member.summary: Checks each block for know-how protection and updates the automate's protected block list.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.CompareTIA.InterfaceNetwork(Siemens.Engineering.HW.DeviceItem,ReceptionDeProjet.MyAutomate,ReceptionDeProjet.MyProject)
member.summary: Extracts network interface and VLAN/subnet information from the main module and updates the automate accordingly.
member.param: The object to update with network interface details.
member.remarks: This method processes PROFINET interfaces, retrieves NTP server settings, VLAN, and connected device details for both X1 and X2 interfaces when available.

member.name: T:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet
member.summary:
UserControl for the "Project Reception" function in AgroFlow.
This module allows users to:
Load and analyze a TIA Portal project.
Verify compliance and retrieve detailed information (project info, PLCs, settings, etc.).
Export all relevant configuration and hardware data into a standardized Excel file for traceability and documentation.
Typical workflow:
Select a CDC Excel file (project requirements/specs).
Select the TIA Portal project to analyze.
Run the verification step, which collects and displays project information and device details.
Export the gathered data back into the provided Excel file for archiving or transfer.
This feature ensures project conformity to standards (Agro Mousquetaires, LTU library, etc.) and provides automatic documentation of PLC hardware and configuration.
Key components:
: Handles TIA Portal project exploration and selection.
: Compares and extracts device information from the selected project.
: Holds configuration and mapping definitions for the PLC project.

member.name: F:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet.sCdcFilePath
member.summary: Path to the loaded CDC Excel file.

member.name: F:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet.oExploreTiaPLC
member.summary: Interface for exploring the TIA Portal project.

member.summary: Interface for comparing the TIA project and retrieving device information.

member.name: F:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet.oPLC_ProjectDefinitions
member.summary: Global configuration and mapping settings for the PLC project.

member.name: F:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet.dData
member.summary: Data storage dictionary for internal processing.

member.name: F:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet.lsDataCollection
member.summary: List of instructions to be generated for the FC (function code).

member.name: F:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet.oTiaProject
member.summary: Stores the loaded TIA Project information.

member.summary: Selects a TIA Portal project via the interface.
member.param: Returns the selected project name if successful.

member.summary: Handles the "Verification" button click event. Retrieves project and PLC device information, updates the info panel, and exports data to Excel.

member.name: M:ReceptionDeProjet.ReceptionDeProjet.ExportDataToExcel
member.summary: Exports project and PLC device data to the loaded CDC Excel file. Writes project info and device details into the appropriate worksheets.
